QuestData.Title: Greener Pastures
QuestData.Description:
You have done an adequate job keeping de little one fed, but sometimes they just want something else.
I did not see where de hatchling went, but you should start where de grass is real green. You will likely find her eating it.
If you have trouble bringing her home, you might try a bribe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Child of Torcali and lead her back to her pen.
